Title: Dust to Dust
Description:
If we are to make camp here, we cannot leave all of these yaungol bodies lying to rot.

Take this torch and set fire to the villagers' corpses.

The incense from the torch should purify the earth and air around them as well.

Even our enemies deserve to be laid to rest.
ObjectivesText: Use the Shado-Pan Torch on 20 Palewind Villagers.
CompletionText: The stench of death is overpowering.
RewardText:
Good work, $n.

Hopefully, their spirits are in a better place.
